video.title: V.R. Troopers
video.synopsis: Three friends who study martial arts find themselves defending humanity from a criminal mastermind and his invading army from another dimension.

episodes.synopsis: On their way to meet professor Hart, Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. are attacked from the air by Air Striker and Fighterbot and on the ground by Skugs.
episodes.title: The Battle Begins: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin and J.B. locate Ryan in the quarry and hurry to his rescue. After a Skug fight, he is brought back to the lab and repaired.
episodes.title: The Battle Begins: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord crashes the lab's computer system to retrieve the secret of Mass Inter-Reality Travel. The Troopers call an ambush by Skugs.
episodes.title: Error in the System

episodes.synopsis: The kids try to help a homeless lady with amnesia. Tao cooks, students pass out flyers, and Kaitlin runs the woman's photo in the newspaper.
episodes.title: Lost Memories

episodes.synopsis: Ziktor wants to destroy all books that teach about solar energy. He starts with Mr. Reese's bookmobile, as a way of getting at J.B.
episodes.title: Battle for the Books

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and J.B. are training two brothers who always argue. Ziktor/Grimlord decides to unleash two monster robot brothers of his own: the Swordbots.
episodes.title: Oh Brother

episodes.synopsis: A neighborhood policewoman offers Tao and the kids a challenge: turn Becky into a karate contender in two weeks and win $1,000.
episodes.title: Grimlord's Challenge

episodes.synopsis: While helping Kaitlin install a graphics program in her computer, J.B. gets sucked through the monitor and into Grimlord's dungeon.
episodes.title: Computer Captive

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin's cousin aspires to be a reporter like Kaitlin, and while on a story, she discovers green slime oozing from the grass in the park.
episodes.title: Kaitlin's Little Helper

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord plants a spy in reality, an investigative reporter named Jeremy, whom Woody hires at the "Underground Voice Daily."
episodes.title: The Virtual Spy

episodes.synopsis: The guys build a pollution-free motorcycle engine in V.R. and put it in J.B.'s Skycycle.
episodes.title: The Virtual V-6

episodes.synopsis: Ziktor sends a Skug to the dojo disguised as a martial arts student who spars with J.B. and transfers to him an electrical charge.
episodes.title: No One's Friend

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord comes up with the idea of turning dog pound pets (and more) into rabid mutant monsters for his own army.
episodes.title: Dogmatic Change

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin takes a photo of a strange building and spots a man in a room with bars on the windows sitting next to a strange "S" symbol on the wall.
episodes.title: Searching for Tyler Steele

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord (aka Ziktor) needs an old-growth forest cleared for a massive breakthrough from Virtual Reality.
episodes.title: Save the Trees

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord sends his evil magician to abduct the real magician and catch the Troopers with their guard down.
episodes.title: A Dirty Trick

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin receives a tip on a big story: A top-secret weapons plant and testing site has been set up outside Cross World City.
episodes.title: Kaitlin's Front Page

episodes.synopsis: Skugs dognap Jeb when he steps outside for a nature call. They take him to Grimlord, who is angered by the dog's wisecracking mouth.
episodes.title: The Dognapping

episodes.synopsis: Jeb the dog is depressed because he's fallen for Princess the Dog and her puppies, but Princess's owner blocks their romance.
episodes.title: My Dog's Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: Following an earthquake, the teens discover that someone is digging shafts to the center of the Earth under a downtown building.
episodes.title: Digging for Fire

episodes.synopsis: In his scheme to take over the planet, Grimlord tries to use the preserved brain of the greatest tactical mind in history.
episodes.title: The Great Brain Robbery

episodes.synopsis: When Tao is informed that the dojo is on the verge of shutting down due to financial problems, Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. organize a fundraiser.
episodes.title: The Dojo Plot

episodes.synopsis: The teens are going to put on a dance-a-thon so that a student of theirs, Brandon, can afford to go to a special music academy.
episodes.title: Grimlord's Greatest Hits

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord plots to overtake reality by making his mutants invisible. Meanwhile, Tao tries to teach the Troopers the importance of stealth in combat.
episodes.title: The Disappearance

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin starts having strange, vivid dreams about the power and invincibility of Grimlord's forces.
episodes.title: Nightmares

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin receives flowers from a secret admirer -- Grimlord! Col. Icebot is developing evil flowers to capture and destroy the Troopers.
episodes.title: Secret Admirer

episodes.synopsis: Col. Icebot penetrates the reality barrier with an ionic cyber beam, and Grimlord wants him to build a robot to open the reality barrier.
episodes.title: Grimlord's House of Fear

episodes.synopsis: J.B. coaches one of two rival baseball teams for a benefit game to raise money to upgrade the field and secure the lease.
episodes.title: Three Strikes

episodes.synopsis: Taking a virtual tour of a dam they've been told is polluted, the teens find a radio signal coming from under the dam itself.
episodes.title: Danger in the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord sends a package to the dojo. When it's opened, Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. are exposed to a strange ray that turns them into children.
episodes.title: Small but Mighty

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers and Professor Hart discover that one of Grimlord's mutants actually possesses human DNA!
episodes.title: Defending Dark Heart: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Dark Heart, about to be executed by Grimlord's Mutants, uses TOXOID as a shield and escapes while Ryan fights Skugs.
episodes.title: Defending Dark Heart: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A Skug learns of the V.R. Troopers' plans to de-virtualize Ryan's father and warns Grimlord.
episodes.title: Defending Dark Heart: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord, knowing Dark Heart/Tyler is gravely injured, launches a full aerial assault on Professor Hart's lab.
episodes.title: Defending Dark Heart: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Ziktor receives some good news: Gen. Ivar has found a weakened area of the reality barrier, and Col. Icebot has developed a new weapon.
episodes.title: Ghost Biker

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin's friend Danielle beseeches her to write a story about the Animal Sanctuary, where Danielle's father is head scientist.
episodes.title: Endangered Species

episodes.synopsis: When the junior high football coach stumbles onto Grimlord's secret base, Skugs shrink him and imprison him in a sports trading card.
episodes.title: Field Goal

episodes.synopsis: Skugs kidnap Baby Boo from his parents in the park and leave the baby on the dojo doorstep.
episodes.title: The Littlest Trooper

episodes.synopsis: Gen. Ivar and Col. Icebot stage a battle with the V.R. Troopers in virtual reality in order to infect them with a Reality Virus.
episodes.title: The Reality Virus

episodes.synopsis: Two circus performers who are scientists in disguise are taken to Professor Hart for help in completing their research on a fuel-increasing formula.
episodes.title: Friends in Need

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin is doing an article on biologically dissimilar twins. Meanwhile, Ziktor has developed a cloning device.
episodes.title: Good Trooper-Bad Trooper

episodes.synopsis: J.B. spars with Ryan in an effort to relax before taking a test to qualify for a scholarship.
episodes.title: The Transmutant

episodes.synopsis: J.B. agrees to help his South American "e-mail pal," Jose, with some research on data involving an extinct volcano that has been strangely vibrating.
episodes.title: Who's King of the Mountain?

episodes.synopsis: Ricky, Tao's visiting nephew, is a couch potato. The kids are planning an obstacle course and they try to get Ricky involved.
episodes.title: The Couch Potato Kid

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord steals Dr. Unger's transforming device, hoping to take the powers of the V.R. Troopers for his army.
episodes.title: The Old Switcharoo

episodes.synopsis: Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. decide to help out a kid who's being bullied at a go-cart track.
episodes.title: Race to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin's cousin from Ireland and his band are in town to perform a benefit concert to help raise awareness concerning the environment.
episodes.title: Fiddler on the Loose

episodes.synopsis: While at an arcade, J.B., Ryan and Kaitlin are visited by a mysterious man who suggests they play the newest game in the store, "Dark Odyssey."
episodes.title: Virtually Powerless

episodes.synopsis: Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. are camping in the wilderness when a streak of light and a thunderous crash alert them to the arrival of an alien spaceship.
episodes.title: New Kids on the Planet

episodes.synopsis: Professor Hart contacts Ryan, Kaitlin, and J.B. at the Underground to relay a message to Ryan from Dr. Monroe.
episodes.title: Message from Space

episodes.synopsis: J.B. and Ryan rescue a stray kitten and take it to an animal shelter, where they meet Amy, a nice young girl with an interest in martial arts.
episodes.title: Rise of the Red Python: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: J.B. is sent to fight the Red Python, which malfunctions mid-battle. Dr. Poindexter offers an extra retroformer to bring her back to normal.
episodes.title: Rise of the Red Python: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Amphibidor's mutiny against Grimlord to become master of Virtual Reality is redirected into an attack on the V.R. Troopers.
episodes.title: Mutant Mutiny

episodes.synopsis: Ziktor tries to destroy Ryan's past with a time machine.
episodes.title: Trooper Out of Time

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers show how to combat stage fright and stop a plot to steal energy from the Power Plant at the same time.
episodes.title: Secret Power

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers attempt to rescue Tyler from Grimlord's dungeon and the evil warlord's plan to steal all of his knowledge.
episodes.title: Quest for Power: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers are forced to infiltrate Grimlord's dungeon in their efforts to rescue Tyler.
episodes.title: Quest for Power: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Ryan loses his V.R. powers as he tries to rescue his father and the other Troopers.
episodes.title: Quest for Power: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Tyler attempts to create new virtual armor to defend the Troopers against Grimlord's new army in outer space.
episodes.title: Quest for Power: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Tyler's new technology is put to the test when Grimlord has a new mutant created to destroy the Troopers.
episodes.title: Quest for Power: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: Ziktor uses a fashion show as an opportunity to try to catch the Troopers in his silk "capture" cocoons.
episodes.title: Fashion Victims

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord launches the Troopers' new video-training game into a real battleground and forces the Troopers to face their most awesome opponent ever.
episodes.title: Game Over

episodes.synopsis: Ryan is trapped underwater by Octobot and is unable to use his powers to save himself.
episodes.title: Watered Down

episodes.synopsis: Ryan rushes to try to save J.B. and Kaitlin, who are headed for the Negative Zone after being zapped by the Doom Master into phantoms on Earth.
episodes.title: The Negative Factor

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord steals Kaitlin's image to create an Anti-Kaitlin programmed to destroy the V.R. Troopers.
episodes.title: Kaitlin Through the Looking Glass: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord's creation, the Anti-Kaitlin, turns against him and steals his Virtual Mirror Program to help reunite the two Kaitlins.
episodes.title: Kaitlin Through the Looking Glass: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Kaitlin is forced to choose between the V.R. Troopers and a movie career as Grimlord creates Photobot to destroy them.
episodes.title: Kaitlin Goes Hollywood

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord's killer plants come alive and destroy the Troopers' motorcycles as they plan on taking over the Earth.
episodes.title: Grimlord Takes Root

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord tries to steal new scientific computer programs that threaten the Troopers' powers.
episodes.title: The Disk

episodes.synopsis: J.B. and Kaitlin face old age before their time after Doom Master's virtual spider bites them.
episodes.title: Virtual Venom

episodes.synopsis: Ryan falls victim to a mind-control motorcycle helmet and threatens Kaitlin's safety.
episodes.title: New World Order

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord attempts to enslave Ryan, Kaitlin and the play center kids with his magic balloons.
episodes.title: Grimlord's Children

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers race to block Lizardbot's plan to destroy them using the stolen energized Millennium Sabre.
episodes.title: The Millennium Sabre

episodes.synopsis: Ancient digs unearth a portal to worlds unknown -- except by Grimlord!
episodes.title: Grimlord's Dark Secret: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A pyramid in another time hides deadly secrets for the Troopers.
episodes.title: Grimlord's Dark Secret: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord sabotages athletes' gold medals in the World Games with plans for global domination.
episodes.title: On the Wrong Track

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord tries to banish all to prehistoric Earth using his magic time bracelets.
episodes.title: Forward into the Past

episodes.synopsis: Ryan unknowingly falls for Alexis, a beautiful mutant who tricks him into a trap.
episodes.title: Into Oraclon's Web

episodes.synopsis: Otto, one of Santa's elves, rescues the Troopers in time for Christmas.
episodes.title: Santa's Secret Trooper

episodes.synopsis: A new type of pet transforms itself into an invasion of monsters that threaten the whole town.
episodes.title: The Charmeeka Invasion

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord traps the Troopers in a dream of his own making.
episodes.title: Dream Battle

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord attempts to steal the musical talents of a popular young rock group.
episodes.title: A Hard Day's Mutant

episodes.synopsis: Oraclon creates a powerful magnet monster to destroy the V.R. Troopers.
episodes.title: Magnetic Attraction

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord creates a powerful love potion for Kaitlin and Percy, who plan their wedding.
episodes.title: Get Me to the Lab on Time

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord frees an evil convict and transforms him into an anti-Trooper weapon.
episodes.title: Grimlord's Big Breakout

episodes.synopsis: Knighttime launches a city attack while the Troopers and Ziktor are on a nature trip.
episodes.title: Field and Scream

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord's Duplitron machine multiplies trouble for the Troopers.
episodes.title: The Duplitron Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Despera sends her evil sister, Desponda, to be the secret weapon in Grimlord's plot to destroy the Troopers.
episodes.title: Despera Strikes Back

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers stumble onto Grimlord's secret weapons factory and are caught in a deadly fog that keeps them from transforming.
episodes.title: The Ghost of Cross World Forest

episodes.synopsis: Grimlord transforms a ventriloquist dummy into a life-size monster that attacks the Troopers.
episodes.title: Grimlord's Dummy

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers and Grimlord are forced to join forces against Knighttime, who has stopped the Earth.
episodes.title: Time Out!

episodes.synopsis: The Troopers have to rescue a new robot from Grimlord, who wants to steal its memory.
episodes.title: Galileo's New Memory
